statements: SELECT * FROM ResearchImpactData
SELECT researcher_name, impact_score, study_date FROM ResearchImpactData WHERE impact_score > 50
SELECT * FROM ResearchImpactData WHERE vulnerable_population = 'Children'
SELECT study_title, researcher_name FROM ResearchImpactData ORDER BY study_date DESC
SELECT AVG(impact_score) FROM ResearchImpactData
SELECT researcher_name, study_title, impact_score FROM ResearchImpactData WHERE vulnerable_population = 'Elderly' ORDER BY impact_score DESC, study_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM ResearchImpactData WHERE impact_score >= 80 AND vulnerable_population LIKE 'Women%' ORDER BY researcher_name ASC;
SELECT id, researcher_name, study_title, vulnerable_population, study_date FROM ResearchImpactData WHERE study_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY study_date DESC;
SELECT id, researcher_name, study_title, impact_score FROM ResearchImpactData WHERE impact_score > 90 OR vulnerable_population IS NULL ORDER BY impact_score DESC, researcher_name ASC;

SELECT researcher_name, study_title, vulnerable_population, study_date FROM ResearchImpactData WHERE study_title ILIKE '%cancer%' AND vulnerable_population IN ('Children', 'Adults') ORDER BY study_date ASC, researcher_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT study_title, study_description FROM research_studies;
SELECT * FROM research_studies WHERE research_area = 'Medicine';
SELECT study_id, study_title, research_area FROM research_studies WHERE vulnerable_population = TRUE;
SELECT result_id, study_id, result_date FROM research_results ORDER BY result_date DESC;
SELECT study_title, result_description FROM research_studies JOIN research_results ON research_studies.study_id = research_results.study_id;
SELECT * FROM research_studies WHERE research_area = 'Biology' ORDER BY study_title DESC;
SELECT study_id, study_title, study_description FROM research_studies WHERE vulnerable_population = TRUE;
SELECT study_title, research_area FROM research_studies WHERE study_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY research_area, study_title;
SELECT rs.study_title, rr.result_date, rr.result_description FROM research_studies rs JOIN research_results rr ON rs.study_id = rr.study_id WHERE rr.result_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_studies, research_area FROM research_studies GROUP BY research_area HAVING num_studies > 2;
SELECT * FROM Researchers;
SELECT researcher_name, research_area FROM Researchers;
SELECT researcher_id, researcher_name FROM Researchers ORDER BY researcher_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM ResearchStudies WHERE study_title LIKE '%cancer%';
SELECT study_title, study_description FROM ResearchStudies WHERE researcher_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Researchers;
SELECT researcher_id, researcher_name FROM Researchers WHERE research_area = 'Biology';
SELECT * FROM ResearchStudies ORDER BY study_title DESC;
SELECT Researchers.researcher_name, ResearchStudies.study_title FROM Researchers JOIN ResearchStudies ON Researchers.researcher_id = ResearchStudies.researcher_id;
SELECT VulnerablePopulations.population_name, Researchers.researcher_name FROM VulnerablePopulations CROSS JOIN Researchers;
SELECT * FROM research_studies;
SELECT study_title, researcher_name FROM research_studies;
SELECT study_id, study_title, research_date FROM research_studies ORDER BY research_date DESC;
SELECT participant_name, participant_age, participant_gender FROM study_participants WHERE study_id = 1;
SELECT finding_description, research_method FROM research_findings WHERE study_id = 2;
SELECT study_title, researcher_name FROM research_studies WHERE study_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM study_participants WHERE participant_age > 30 ORDER BY participant_name DESC;
SELECT study_title, finding_description FROM research_studies JOIN research_findings ON research_studies.study_id = research_findings.study_id;
SELECT DISTINCT researcher_name FROM research_studies WHERE research_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';

SELECT population_name, COUNT(participant_id) AS total_participants FROM vulnerable_populations JOIN study_participants ON vulnerable_populations.population_id = study_participants.study_id GROUP BY population_name ORDER BY total_participants DESC;
SELECT * FROM Researchers;
SELECT researcher_name, institution FROM Researchers WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT study_title, start_date, end_date FROM Studies WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM VulnerablePopulations ORDER BY population_size DESC;

SELECT r.researcher_name, s.study_title, v.population_name, a.result_score FROM Researchers r JOIN ResearchImpact ri ON r.researcher_id = ri.researcher_id JOIN Studies s ON ri.study_id = s.study_id JOIN VulnerablePopulations v ON ri.population_id = v.population_id JOIN AnalysisResults a ON ri.impact_id = a.impact_id;
SELECT * FROM Researchers WHERE researcher_id = 1;
SELECT researcher_name, institution FROM Researchers WHERE institution LIKE 'Univ%';
SELECT study_title, start_date, end_date FROM Studies WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT impact_score FROM ResearchImpact WHERE impact_score >= 0.8 ORDER BY impact_score DESC;

SELECT r.researcher_name, s.study_title, p.population_name FROM Researchers r JOIN ResearchImpact ri ON r.researcher_id = ri.researcher_id JOIN Studies s ON s.study_id = ri.study_id JOIN VulnerablePopulations p ON p.population_id = ri.population_id WHERE ri.impact_score > 0.5 ORDER BY ri.impact_score DESC, p.population_size DESC;
